user_name: The name of the user who posted the review.
airline_sentiment: Overall sentiment towards the airline of this review (positive, neutral, or negative).
airline_name: Name of the reviewed airline company.
review_text: Content of the user's review and feedback.
thumbup_count: Count of positive reactions received from other users for this review.
review_coordinates: Geographic coordinates when this review was posted.
review_timestamp: Date and time when this review was posted.
review_city: City where this review was posted.
user_timezone: Time zone of the user posting this review.
